Name: The Usual
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Orange peel infused Martini Riserva Speciale Ambrato Special ingredient #2 : Cherry balsamic & cola reduction shrub at 4:3 ratio
History: Created in 2016 by Grant Murray at Bar One, Inverness for Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Calling competition.
Nutrition: One serving of The Usual contains 121 calories
